    • slotSharingGroup

      public TableMaintenance.Builder slotSharingGroup(String newSlotSharingGroup)
      The SingleOutputStreamOperator.slotSharingGroup(String) for all the operators of the generated stream. Could be used to separate the resources used by this task.
      Parameters:
      newSlotSharingGroup - to be used for the operators

      Sets the delay for checking lock availability when a concurrent run is detected.
      Parameters:

    • parallelism

      public TableMaintenance.Builder parallelism(int newParallelism)
      Sets the default parallelism of maintenance tasks. Could be overwritten by the MaintenanceTaskBuilder.parallelism(int).
      Parameters:
      newParallelism - task parallelism

    • maxReadBack

      public TableMaintenance.Builder maxReadBack(int newMaxReadBack)
      Maximum number of snapshots checked when started with an embedded MonitorSource at the first time. Only available when the TableMaintenance.forTable(StreamExecutionEnvironment, TableLoader, TriggerLockFactory) is used.
      Parameters:
      newMaxReadBack - snapshots to consider when initializing
